vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a house or home
vocabulary.example: Vivo en una casa grande. (I live in a big house.)
Voy a comer pizza. (I am going to eat pizza.)
¿Puedes darme agua? (Can you give me water?)
Este libro es interesante. (This book is interesting.)
Estoy feliz hoy. (I am happy today.)
Tengo mucho trabajo. (I have a lot of work.)
La escuela está cerca de mi casa. (The school is near my house.)
Tengo un perro pequeño. (I have a small dog.)
El gato duerme en la cama. (The cat sleeps on the bed.)
Me gusta correr en el parque. (I like to run in the park.)
Nos vemos mañana. (See you tomorrow.)
Me gusta esta canción. (I like this song.)
Voy a viajar a España. (I am going to travel to Spain.)
Mi coche es rojo. (My car is red.)
La comida está deliciosa. (The food is delicious.)
El tren es muy rápido. (The train is very fast.)
Este examen es difícil. (This exam is difficult.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to the time of day
vocabulary.example: La noche es tranquila. (The night is peaceful.)
Me gusta salir por la mañana. (I like to go out in the morning.)
El amor es importante. (Love is important.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: When referring to your job or work
vocabulary.example: Mi trabajo es interesante. (My job is interesting.)
El cielo está claro hoy. (The sky is clear today.)
Mi amiga vive en Madrid. (My friend lives in Madrid.)
Me gusta comer fruta. (I like to eat fruit.)
Puedo ver el mar. (I can see the sea.)
Tengo dos hermanos. (I have two brothers.)
Me gusta bailar salsa. (I like to dance salsa.)
Corro todos los días. (I run every day.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Describing something or someone as rich or delicious
vocabulary.example: Este pastel está rico. (This cake is delicious.)
Vamos a ver una película. (We are going to watch a movie.)
Voy a la tienda a comprar leche. (I’m going to the store to buy milk.)
Perdón, no lo sabía. (Sorry, I didn’t know.)
El coche está aparcado. (The car is parked.)
Tengo que estudiar para el examen. (I have to study for the exam.)
Voy a llamar a mi madre. (I am going to call my mother.)
Hace frío hoy. (It’s cold today.)
La luz está apagada. (The light is off.)
Mi familia es muy unida. (My family is very close.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a party or celebration
vocabulary.example: Vamos a una fiesta este fin de semana. (We are going to a party this weekend.)
Estoy leyendo un libro interesante. (I’m reading an interesting book.)
Vivo en España. (I live in Spain.)
Me gusta comer pizza. (I like to eat pizza.)
La mesa está limpia. (The table is clean.)
Tengo nuevos zapatos. (I have new shoes.)
El trabajo es difícil hoy. (The work is hard today.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to romantic or familial love
vocabulary.example: El amor es eterno. (Love is eternal.)
Soy estudiante de ingeniería. (I am an engineering student.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to one's home or family
vocabulary.example: 我在家。 (Wǒ zài jiā.) (I am at home.)
我在读书。 (Wǒ zài dú shū.) (I am reading a book.)
我有一只猫。 (Wǒ yǒu yī zhī māo.) (I have a cat.)
我有一只狗。 (Wǒ yǒu yī zhī gǒu.) (I have a dog.)
我喝水。 (Wǒ hē shuǐ.) (I drink water.)
我喜欢吃苹果。 (Wǒ xǐhuān chī píngguǒ.) (I like to eat apples.)
这是我的车。 (Zhè shì wǒ de chē.) (This is my car.)
我的老师很友好。 (Wǒ de lǎoshī hěn yǒuhǎo.) (My teacher is very friendly.)
她是我的学生。 (Tā shì wǒ de xuéshēng.) (She is my student.)
我每天去学校。 (Wǒ měitiān qù xuéxiào.) (I go to school every day.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to the sky or a day
vocabulary.example: 今天是个好天。 (Jīntiān shì gè hǎo tiān.) (Today is a good day.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a month or the moon
vocabulary.example: 今晚的月亮很大。 (Jīnwǎn de yuèliàng hěn dà.) (The moon is big tonight.)
太阳很大。 (Tàiyáng hěn dà.) (The sun is very big.)
我们去爬山吧。 (Wǒmen qù pá shān ba.) (Let's go hiking.)
我喜欢去海边。 (Wǒ xǐhuān qù hǎibiān.) (I like to go to the beach.)
飞机很快。 (Fēijī hěn kuài.) (The airplane is fast.)
我需要打电话。 (Wǒ xūyào dǎ diànhuà.) (I need to make a phone call.)
我在看电视。 (Wǒ zài kàn diànshì.) (I am watching TV.)
我没有钱。 (Wǒ méiyǒu qián.) (I have no money.)
我喜欢吃水果。 (Wǒ xǐhuān chī shuǐguǒ.) (I like to eat fruit.)
我穿了新衣服。 (Wǒ chuānle xīn yīfú.) (I am wearing new clothes.)
我买了一双鞋。 (Wǒ mǎile yī shuāng xié.) (I bought a pair of shoes.)
我在用电脑。 (Wǒ zài yòng diànnǎo.) (I am using the computer.)
你打电话给我。 (Nǐ dǎ diànhuà gěi wǒ.) (You call me.)
我看电视。 (Wǒ kàn diànshì.) (I watch TV.)
飞机飞得很高。 (Fēijī fēi dé hěn gāo.) (The airplane flies very high.)
我去银行取钱。 (Wǒ qù yínháng qǔ qián.) (I go to the bank to withdraw money.)
我们去公园散步。 (Wǒmen qù gōngyuán sànbù.) (We go to the park for a walk.)
我们在餐厅吃饭。 (Wǒmen zài cāntīng chīfàn.) (We are eating at the restaurant.)
我在厨房做饭。 (Wǒ zài chúfáng zuò fàn.) (I am cooking in the kitchen.)
桌子上有书。 (Zhuōzi shàng yǒu shū.) (There is a book on the table.)
这把椅子很舒服。 (Zhè bǎ yǐzi hěn shūfu.) (This chair is very comfortable.)
我喜欢喝咖啡。 (Wǒ xǐhuān hē kāfēi.) (I like to drink coffee.)
我喝茶。 (Wǒ hē chá.) (I drink tea.)
我喝牛奶。 (Wǒ hē niúnǎi.) (I drink milk.)
我吃面包。 (Wǒ chī miànbāo.) (I eat bread.)
我开车去工作。 (Wǒ kāichē qù gōngzuò.) (I drive to work.)
飞机起飞了。 (Fēijī qǐfēi le.) (The airplane has taken off.)
火车站在哪里？ (Huǒchē zhàn zài nǎlǐ?) (Where is the train station?)
我在读书。 (Wǒ zài dú shū.) (I am reading a book.)
请给我一支笔。 (Qǐng gěi wǒ yī zhī bǐ.) (Please give me a pen.)
我要一张纸。 (Wǒ yào yī zhāng zhǐ.) (I want a piece of paper.)
我喜欢看电视。 (Wǒ xǐhuān kàn diànshì.) (I like to watch TV.)
我在用电脑。 (Wǒ zài yòng diànnǎo.) (I am using the computer.)
我喜欢吃苹果。 (Wǒ xǐhuān chī píngguǒ.) (I like to eat apples.)
我渴了，我想喝水。 (Wǒ kě le, wǒ xiǎng hē shuǐ.) (I am thirsty, I want to drink water.)
火很大。 (Huǒ hěn dà.) (The fire is big.)
我去看医生。 (Wǒ qù kàn yīshēng.) (I go to see a doctor.)
我们在学校学习。 (Wǒmen zài xuéxiào xuéxí.) (We study at school.)
我在图书馆借书。 (Wǒ zài túshūguǎn jiè shū.) (I borrow books from the library.)
我去医院看病。 (Wǒ qù yīyuàn kàn bìng.) (I go to the hospital to see a doctor.)
我去商店买东西。 (Wǒ qù shāngdiàn mǎi dōngxi.) (I go to the store to buy things.)
这条街道很长。 (Zhè tiáo jiēdào hěn cháng.) (This street is very long.)
Je suis à la maison. (I am at home.)
Le chien est mignon. (The dog is cute.)
Mon chat est noir. (My cat is black.)
J'ai une voiture rouge. (I have a red car.)
Je lis un livre. (I am reading a book.)
La fenêtre est ouverte. (The window is open.)
Je mange une pomme. (I am eating an apple.)
Je veux de l'eau. (I want water.)
J'achète du pain. (I am buying bread.)
La table est grande. (The table is big.)
Ma chambre est propre. (My room is clean.)
Mon voisin est sympathique. (My neighbor is friendly.)
Cette fleur est belle. (This flower is beautiful.)
Le ciel est bleu. (The sky is blue.)
Nous allons à la montagne. (We are going to the mountain.)
La rivière est calme. (The river is calm.)
Je vais à l'école. (I go to school.)
Cet arbre est vieux. (This tree is old.)
Le soleil brille. (The sun is shining.)
La lune est pleine. (The moon is full.)
Mon ami est gentil. (My friend is kind.)
Ma famille est grande. (My family is large.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a party or celebration
vocabulary.example: Nous avons une fête ce soir. (We have a party tonight.)
Je bois du café tous les matins. (I drink coffee every morning.)
J'adore le chocolat. (I love chocolate.)
Je fais du vélo tous les jours. (I ride my bicycle every day.)
Nous allons à la plage demain. (We are going to the beach tomorrow.)
J'aime aller au restaurant. (I like to go to the restaurant.)
Nous avons réservé un hôtel. (We booked a hotel.)
Je lis un livre intéressant. (I am reading an interesting book.)
J'écoute de la musique. (I listen to music.)
Nous allons regarder un film. (We are going to watch a movie.)
La télévision est allumée. (The television is on.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a card or map
vocabulary.example: J'ai une carte du monde. (I have a world map.)
Ma chambre est confortable. (My room is comfortable.)
Je travaille sur mon ordinateur. (I work on my computer.)
J'ai perdu mon téléphone. (I lost my phone.)
La lumière est éteinte. (The light is off.)
Le soleil brille. (The sun is shining.)
Cette fleur est rouge. (This flower is red.)
Mon chien est gentil. (My dog is friendly.)
Le chat dort. (The cat is sleeping.)
J'ai une voiture rouge. (I have a red car.)
L'arbre est grand. (The tree is big.)
Le ciel est bleu. (The sky is blue.)
Le lac est calme. (The lake is calm.)
Nous montons la montagne. (We are climbing the mountain.)
Il pleut. (It is raining.)
La neige tombe. (The snow is falling.)
L'été est ma saison préférée. (Summer is my favorite season.)
La lune brille. (The moon is shining.)
Les étoiles brillent. (The stars are shining.)
La rivière coule vite. (The river flows fast.)
La forêt est dense. (The forest is dense.)
Paris est une grande cité. (Paris is a big city.)
Il vit dans un petit village. (He lives in a small village.)
Je vais à l'école. (I go to school.)
Je suis étudiant. (I am a student.)
Mon professeur est gentil. (My teacher is kind.)
J'ai un livre intéressant. (I have an interesting book.)
Ich bin zu Hause. (I am at home.)
Das Auto ist neu. (The car is new.)
Der Hund läuft. (The dog is running.)
Die Katze schläft. (The cat is sleeping.)
Der Baum ist groß. (The tree is tall.)
Ich trinke Wasser. (I drink water.)
Mein Freund ist nett. (My friend is nice.)
Der Mensch arbeitet. (The person is working.)
Ich lese ein Buch. (I am reading a book.)
Der Tisch ist groß. (The table is big.)
Ich sitze auf dem Stuhl. (I am sitting on the chair.)
Das Fenster ist offen. (The window is open.)
Die Tür ist geschlossen. (The door is closed.)
Die Straße ist lang. (The street is long.)
Ich gehe im Park. (I am walking in the park.)
Ich esse einen Apfel. (I am eating an apple.)
Das Brot ist frisch. (The bread is fresh.)
Ich trinke Milch. (I drink milk.)
Ich trinke Kaffee. (I drink coffee.)
Ich trinke Tee. (I drink tea.)
Das Zimmer ist groß. (The room is big.)
Ich gehe zur Schule. (I go to school.)
Ich bin bei der Arbeit. (I am at work.)
Ich esse gern Essen. (I like eating food.)
Ich trinke ein Getränk. (I drink a beverage.)
Ich kaufe neue Kleidung. (I buy new clothes.)
Er trägt ein Hemd. (He is wearing a shirt.)
Ich trage eine Hose. (I am wearing pants.)
Ich habe neue Schuhe. (I have new shoes.)
Mein Kopf tut weh. (My head hurts.)
Mein Arm ist verletzt. (My arm is injured.)
Mein Bein tut weh. (My leg hurts.)
Der Fahrstuhl ist schnell. (The elevator is fast.)
Der Flughafen ist groß. (The airport is big.)
Der Zug fährt schnell. (The train is fast.)
Das Flugzeug fliegt hoch. (The airplane is flying high.)
Der Bus ist voll. (The bus is full.)
Berlin ist eine große Stadt. (Berlin is a big city.)
Deutschland ist ein Land. (Germany is a country.)
Die Alpen sind ein Gebirge. (The Alps are a mountain range.)
Das Meer ist blau. (The sea is blue.)
Ich schwimme im See. (I swim in the lake.)
Der Fluss fließt schnell. (The river flows fast.)
Der Berg ist hoch. (The mountain is tall.)
Der Wald ist groß. (The forest is big.)
Die Straße ist lang. (The street is long.)
Der Platz ist schön. (The square is beautiful.)
Die Brücke ist alt. (The bridge is old.)
Das Fenster ist offen. (The window is open.)
Die Tür ist geschlossen. (The door is closed.)
私は家にいます。 (Watashi wa ie ni imasu.) (I am at home.)
私は学校に行きます。 (Watashi wa gakkou ni ikimasu.) (I go to school.)
私は犬が好きです。 (Watashi wa inu ga suki desu.) (I like dogs.)
猫はかわいいです。 (Neko wa kawaii desu.) (The cat is cute.)
私は車を持っています。 (Watashi wa kuruma wo motteimasu.) (I have a car.)
私はご飯を食べます。 (Watashi wa gohan wo tabemasu.) (I eat rice.)
私は水を飲みます。 (Watashi wa mizu wo nomimasu.) (I drink water.)
私は映画を見ます。 (Watashi wa eiga wo mimasu.) (I watch a movie.)
私は音楽を聞きます。 (Watashi wa ongaku wo kikimasu.) (I listen to music.)
私は寝ます。 (Watashi wa nemasu.) (I sleep.)
先生、質問があります。 (Sensei, shitsumon ga arimasu.) (Teacher, I have a question.)
私は学生です。 (Watashi wa gakusei desu.) (I am a student.)
彼は私の友達です。 (Kare wa watashi no tomodachi desu.) (He is my friend.)
私は町に住んでいます。 (Watashi wa machi ni sundeimasu.) (I live in a town.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a day or the sun
vocabulary.example: 今日は晴れです。 (Kyou wa hare desu.) (It is sunny today.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to the moon or month
vocabulary.example: 今月は忙しいです。 (Kongetsu wa isogashii desu.) (This month is busy.)
水をください。 (Mizu wo kudasai.) (Please give me water.)
今日は食事に行きます。 (Kyou wa shokuji ni ikimasu.) (I am going to have a meal today.)
電車に乗ります。 (Densha ni norimasu.) (I will get on the train.)

vocabulary.word: 自転車 (じてんしゃ, jitensha)
vocabulary.example: 私は自転車で学校に行きます。 (Watashi wa jitensha de gakkou ni ikimasu.) (I go to school by bicycle.)
彼は私の友達です。 (Kare wa watashi no tomodachi desu.) (He is my friend.)
私は日本に行きたいです。 (Watashi wa Nihon ni ikitai desu.) (I want to go to Japan.)
今日は空が青いです。 (Kyou wa sora ga aoi desu.) (The sky is blue today.)
この山は高いです。 (Kono yama wa takai desu.) (This mountain is tall.)
川を渡ります。 (Kawa wo watarimasu.) (I will cross the river.)
鳥が飛んでいます。 (Tori ga tondeimasu.) (The bird is flying.)
花がきれいです。 (Hana ga kirei desu.) (The flowers are beautiful.)
私は本を読みます。 (Watashi wa hon wo yomimasu.) (I read books.)
私は映画を見ました。 (Watashi wa eiga wo mimashita.) (I watched a movie.)
音楽を聴くのが好きです。 (Ongaku wo kiku no ga suki desu.) (I like listening to music.)
私は車で出かけます。 (Watashi wa kuruma de dekakemasu.) (I go out by car.)
私は食べ物が好きです。 (Watashi wa tabemono ga suki desu.) (I like food.)
天気が良いです。 (Tenki ga yoi desu.) (The weather is good.)
時間がありません。 (Jikan ga arimasen.) (I don't have time.)
昼ごはんを食べました。 (Hirugohan wo tabemashita.) (I ate lunch.)
夜は暗いです。 (Yoru wa kurai desu.) (It is dark at night.)
私は仕事をしています。 (Watashi wa shigoto wo shiteimasu.) (I am working.)
私の家族は四人です。 (Watashi no kazoku wa yonin desu.) (My family has four members.)
この店は人気です。 (Kono mise wa ninki desu.) (This store is popular.)
私は手紙を書きました。 (Watashi wa tegami wo kakimashita.) (I wrote a letter.)
彼は私の友達です。 (Kare wa watashi no tomodachi desu.) (He is my friend.)
私は朝ごはんを食べます。 (Watashi wa asagohan wo tabemasu.) (I eat breakfast.)
私は映画を見ます。 (Watashi wa eiga wo mimasu.) (I watch a movie.)
私は手紙を書きます。 (Watashi wa tegami wo kakimasu.) (I write a letter.)
私は学校に行きます。 (Watashi wa gakkou ni ikimasu.) (I go to school.)
私は夜10時に寝ます。 (Watashi wa yoru juu-ji ni nemasu.) (I sleep at 10 PM.)
私は日本語を話します。 (Watashi wa Nihongo wo hanashimasu.) (I speak Japanese.)
私は新しい本を買います。 (Watashi wa atarashii hon wo kaimasu.) (I buy a new book.)
私は水を飲みます。 (Watashi wa mizu wo nomimasu.) (I drink water.)
私は友達を待ちます。 (Watashi wa tomodachi wo machimasu.) (I wait for my friend.)
هذا بيتي. (Hatha bayti.) (This is my house.)
أقرأ الكتاب. (Aqra' al-kitaab.) (I read the book.)
أنا في المدرسة. (Ana fi al-madrasa.) (I am at school.)
أحتاج إلى قلم. (Ahtaj ila qalam.) (I need a pen.)
هذه سيارتي. (Hadhihi sayyarati.) (This is my car.)
أحتاج إلى ماء. (Ahtaj ila maa.) (I need water.)
أبي هنا. (Abi huna.) (My father is here.)
أمي في المنزل. (Ummii fi al-manzil.) (My mother is at home.)
الشمس ساطعة. (Al-shams saati'a.) (The sun is shining.)
القمر جميل. (Al-qamar jameel.) (The moon is beautiful.)
الشجرة كبيرة. (Al-shajarah kabeerah.) (The tree is big.)
النهر طويل. (Al-nahr taweel.) (The river is long.)
هذه كلمة جديدة. (Hadhihi kalimah jadeedah.) (This is a new word.)
عينك جميلة. (Aynak jameelah.) (Your eye is beautiful.)
ألم في رأسي. (Alam fi ra'si.) (I have a headache.)
يدك جميلة. (Yadak jameelah.) (Your hand is beautiful.)
فمك مفتوح. (Famuk maftooh.) (Your mouth is open.)
أذني تؤلمني. (Udhuni tu'limuni.) (My ear hurts.)
الطاولة كبيرة. (Al-taa-wilah kabeerah.) (The table is big.)
الكرسي مريح. (Al-kursi mureeh.) (The chair is comfortable.)
السقف عالي. (Al-saqf 'aalee.) (The ceiling is high.)
الباب مفتوح. (Al-baab maftooh.) (The door is open.)
النافذة مغلقة. (Al-naafidhah mughlaqah.) (The window is closed.)
الحائط أبيض. (Al-haa'it abyad.) (The wall is white.)
السقف منخفض. (Al-saqf munkhafid.) (The roof is low.)
الباب مغلق. (Al-baab mughlaq.) (The gate is closed.)
أنا في الشارع. (Ana fi al-shari'a.) (I am in the street.)
المدينة كبيرة. (Al-madiinah kabeerah.) (The city is big.)
أنت من أي دولة؟ (Anta min ay dawlah?) (Which country are you from?)
أدرس اللغة العربية. (Adrusu al-lughah al-'Arabiyyah.) (I study the Arabic language.)
قلبي سعيد. (Qalbi sa'id.) (My heart is happy.)
أنا أفكر في هذا. (Ana ufakkir fi hadha.) (I am thinking about this.)
أنا آكل الآن. (Ana aakul al-aan.) (I am eating now.)
أنا أشرب الماء. (Ana ashrab al-maa.) (I am drinking water.)
أذهب إلى المدرسة. (Adhhab ila al-madrasa.) (I am going to school.)
هو جاء الآن. (Huwa ja'a al-aan.) (He has come now.)
أنا أعمل في الشركة. (Ana a'mal fi al-sharikah.) (I work at the company.)
سافرت إلى مصر. (Saafartu ila Misr.) (I traveled to Egypt.)
أنا أجري في الحديقة. (Ana ajri fi al-hadeeqah.) (I am running in the garden.)
غسلت يدي. (Ghasaltu yadi.) (I washed my hands.)
أجلس هنا. (Ajlis huna.) (I sit here.)
نزلت من السيارة. (Nazaltu min al-sayyaarah.) (I descended from the car.)
صعدت إلى الطابق العلوي. (Sa'dtu ila al-ttabaq al-‘ulwi.) (I ascended to the upper floor.)
ركبنا السيارة. (Rakibna al-sayyara.) (We rode the car.)
السلام عليكم. (As-salamu ‘alaykum.) (Peace be upon you.)
الحرب دمرت المدينة. (Al-harb dammarat al-madiinah.) (The war destroyed the city.)
أحتاج إلى السلام. (Ahtaju ila al-salaam.) (I need safety.)
أنا أحب عائلتي. (Ana uhibbu ‘aa’ilati.) (I love my family.)
أصدقائي هنا. (Asdiqaa’i huna.) (My friends are here.)
أنا في المدرسة. (Ana fi al-madrasa.) (I am in school.)
यह मेरा घर है। (Yeh mera ghar hai.) (This is my home.)
मुझे पानी चाहिए। (Mujhe pani chahiye.) (I need water.)
मैं खाना खा रहा हूँ। (Main khana kha raha hoon.) (I am eating food.)
रात को आना। (Raat ko aana.) (Come at night.)
आज बहुत अच्छा दिन है। (Aaj bahut accha din hai.) (Today is a very good day.)
वह मेरा मित्र है। (Vah mera mitr hai.) (He is my friend.)
मैं स्कूल जा रहा हूँ। (Main school ja raha hoon.) (I am going to school.)
मेरे पास एक किताब है। (Mere paas ek kitaab hai.) (I have a book.)
वह बच्चा बहुत प्यारा है। (Vah bachcha bahut pyaara hai.) (That child is very cute.)
मैं तुमसे प्यार करता हूँ। (Main tumse pyaar karta hoon.) (I love you.)
मुझे सपना आया। (Mujhe sapna aaya.) (I had a dream.)
क्या आप चाय पीना चाहेंगे? (Kya aap chai peena chaheinge?) (Would you like to drink tea?)
मैंने एक सपना देखा। (Maine ek sapna dekha.) (I saw a dream.)
समय बहुत महत्वपूर्ण है। (Samay bahut mahatvapurn hai.) (Time is very important.)
हवा ताजगी से भरपूर है। (Hawa taazgi se bharpoor hai.) (The air is fresh.)
सूरज तेज़ है। (Suraj tez hai.) (The sun is hot.)
चाँद बहुत सुंदर है। (Chaand bahut sundar hai.) (The moon is very beautiful.)
वह पक्षी उड़ रहा है। (Vah pakshi ud raha hai.) (The bird is flying.)
मेरे पास बहुत पैसा है। (Mere paas bahut paisa hai.) (I have a lot of money.)
मुझे दवा चाहिए। (Mujhe dawa chahiye.) (I need medicine.)
यह सेब मीठा है। (Yeh seb meetha hai.) (This apple is sweet.)
यह अच्छा है। (Yeh accha hai.) (This is good.)
यह घर बड़ा है। (Yeh ghar bada hai.) (This house is big.)
यह नया है। (Yeh naya hai.) (This is new.)
यह पुराना है। (Yeh purana hai.) (This is old.)
मुझे संगीत बहुत पसंद है। (Mujhe sangeet bahut pasand hai.) (I love music.)
यह चित्र बहुत सुंदर है। (Yeh chitra bahut sundar hai.) (This picture is very beautiful.)
मेरे पास एक कार है। (Mere paas ek car hai.) (I have a car.)
मेरे पास दोनों हाथ हैं। (Mere paas dono haath hain.) (I have both hands.)
वह अपने पैरों से चलता है। (Vah apne pairon se chalta hai.) (He walks with his legs.)
तुम कहाँ जा रहे हो? (Tum kahaan ja rahe ho?) (Where are you going?)
मैं स्कूल जा रहा हूँ। (Main school ja raha hoon.) (I am going to school.)
हम एक साथ हैं। (Hum ek saath hain.) (We are together.)
वह अच्छा है। (Vah accha hai.) (He/She is good.)
यह अच्छा है। (Yeh accha hai.) (This is good.)
वो अच्छा है। (Vo accha hai.) (That is good.)
मुझे खुशी है। (Mujhe khushi hai.) (I am happy.)
मुझे दुख है। (Mujhe dukh hai.) (I am sad.)
मुझे आशा है। (Mujhe aasha hai.) (I have hope.)
मेरे पास अच्छे सपने हैं। (Mere paas achhe sapne hain.) (I have good dreams.)
वह मेरा दोस्त है। (Vah mera dost hai.) (He is my friend.)
सूरज चमक रहा है। (Sooraj chamak raha hai.) (The sun is shining.)
चाँद बहुत सुंदर है। (Chaand bahut sundar hai.) (The moon is very beautiful.)
बारिश हो रही है। (Baarish ho rahi hai.) (It is raining.)
हवा बहुत तेज है। (Hawa bahut tez hai.) (The wind is very strong.)
आग जल रही है। (Aag jal rahi hai.) (The fire is burning.)
मुझे पानी चाहिए। (Mujhe pani chahiye.) (I need water.)
यह किताब अच्छी है। (Yeh kitaab acchi hai.) (This book is good.)
मैं खाना खा रहा हूँ। (Main khana khaa raha hoon.) (I am eating food.)
वह बहुत प्यारा है। (Vah bahut pyaara hai.) (He is very lovely.)
Eu amo você. (I love you.)
Eu moro em uma casa. (I live in a house.)
Eu tenho um carro. (I have a car.)
Ele é meu amigo. (He is my friend.)
Estou feliz. (I am happy.)
Eu estou no trabalho. (I am at work.)
Eu estudo na escola. (I study at school.)
Eu estou lendo um livro. (I am reading a book.)
O gato está dormindo. (The cat is sleeping.)
O cachorro está correndo. (The dog is running.)
Minha mãe é muito carinhosa. (My mother is very caring.)
Meu pai é médico. (My father is a doctor.)
Eu tenho um filho. (I have a son.)
Ela é minha filha. (She is my daughter.)
O sol está brilhando. (The sun is shining.)
A lua está cheia. (The moon is full.)
Eu preciso de água. (I need water.)
Eu estou com fome, quero comida. (I am hungry, I want food.)
A janela está aberta. (The window is open.)
A porta está fechada. (The door is closed.)
Eu estou escrevendo uma carta. (I am writing a letter.)
Eu estou lendo um livro. (I am reading a book.)
Ele está correndo no parque. (He is running in the park.)
Ela está comendo uma maçã. (She is eating an apple.)
Eu estou vendo um filme. (I am watching a movie.)
Ela está feliz. (She is happy.)
Eu estou triste. (I am sad.)
A vista é linda. (The view is beautiful.)
Ele é muito inteligente. (He is very intelligent.)
Ela é uma pessoa amável. (She is a kind person.)
Eu comprei um livro novo. (I bought a new book.)
Eu comprei uma camisa. (I bought a shirt.)
Eu uso sapatos vermelhos. (I wear red shoes.)
Eu estou usando o computador. (I am using the computer.)
Eu tenho um telefone novo. (I have a new phone.)
A cachoeira é linda. (The waterfall is beautiful.)
Eu gosto de caminhar na floresta. (I like to walk in the forest.)
Eu adoro a praia. (I love the beach.)
Eu moro na cidade. (I live in the city.)
O Brasil é um país grande. (Brazil is a big country.)
Eu preciso de dinheiro. (I need money.)
Eu gosto de música clássica. (I like classical music.)
Eu toco piano. (I play the piano.)
Eu estou fazendo uma viagem. (I am taking a trip.)
Eu vou para a escola. (I am going to school.)
Eu estudo na universidade. (I study at the university.)
Eu estou indo para o trabalho. (I am going to work.)
Ele é meu amigo. (He is my friend.)
Eu amo minha família. (I love my family.)
O amor é lindo. (Love is beautiful.)
Я дома. (I am at home.)
Моя собака большая. (My dog is big.)
Она любит кошек. (She loves cats.)
Моя мать работает. (My mother works.)
Мой отец врач. (My father is a doctor.)
У меня много друзей. (I have many friends.)
Я читаю книгу. (I am reading a book.)
На столе есть книга. (There is a book on the table.)
Я иду на работу. (I am going to work.)
Я учусь в школе. (I study at school.)
Я живу в большом городе. (I live in a big city.)
Я родом из другой страны. (I am from another country.)
На дворе растет большое дерево. (A big tree grows in the yard.)
У меня есть машина. (I have a car.)
Я еду на поезде. (I am traveling by train.)
Самолет приземлился. (The airplane has landed.)
Река течет быстро. (The river flows fast.)
Мы поехали на озеро. (We went to the lake.)
Солнце светит ярко. (The sun shines brightly.)
Луна яркая. (The moon is bright.)
Я пью воду. (I drink water.)
Птица летит в небе. (The bird is flying in the sky.)
Цветок красивый. (The flower is beautiful.)
Я ем яблоко. (I am eating an apple.)
Я люблю бананы. (I love bananas.)
Я пью молоко. (I drink milk.)
Я ем хлеб. (I eat bread.)
Я кладу сахар в чай. (I put sugar in tea.)
Добавь соль в суп. (Add salt to the soup.)
Я добавляю перец в салат. (I add pepper to the salad.)
Я пью вино. (I drink wine.)
Мы ужинаем в ресторане. (We are having dinner at the restaurant.)
Я пойду в кафе. (I am going to the cafe.)
Я иду в магазин. (I am going to the store.)
У меня нет денег. (I have no money.)
На стене есть часы. (There is a clock on the wall.)
Я использую телефон. (I am using the phone.)
Я работаю на компьютере. (I work on the computer.)
Я использую интернет. (I use the internet.)
Я смотрю телевизор. (I am watching television.)
Он идет на работу. (He is going to work.)
Он студент. (He is a student.)
Мой учитель хороший. (My teacher is good.)
Я слушаю песню. (I am listening to a song.)
Я люблю музыку. (I love music.)
Я смотрю фильм. (I am watching a movie.)
Мы идем в театр. (We are going to the theater.)
Это красивая картина. (This is a beautiful painting.)
Это скульптура из мрамора. (This is a marble sculpture.)
Это история о древнем городе. (This is a story about an ancient city.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to a house or home
vocabulary.example: 나는 집에 있어요. (I am at home.)
그는 좋은 사람이에요. (He is a good person.)
나는 학교에 가요. (I go to school.)
이 책은 재미있어요. (This book is interesting.)
나는 사과를 먹어요. (I am eating an apple.)
고양이가 귀여워요. (The cat is cute.)
강아지가 좋아요. (I like dogs.)
물을 마셔요. (I drink water.)
밥을 먹어요. (I eat rice.)
차를 마셔요. (I drink tea.)
하늘이 맑아요. (The sky is clear.)
오늘 날씨가 좋아요. (The weather is nice today.)
나무가 커요. (The tree is big.)
꽃이 예뻐요. (The flower is pretty.)
학교에 가요. (I go to school.)
가게에서 물건을 사요. (I buy things at the store.)
차를 운전해요. (I drive a car.)
나는 집에 있어요. (I am at home.)
음악을 들어요. (I listen to music.)

돈이 필요해요. (I need money.)
시간이 없어요. (I don’t have time.)
배를 타요. (I ride a boat.)
음식을 먹어요. (I eat food.)
커피를 마셔요. (I drink coffee.)
책상이 깨끗해요. (The desk is clean.)
창문이 열려 있어요. (The window is open.)
문을 열어요. (I open the door.)
모자를 써요. (I wear a hat.)
신발을 신어요. (I wear shoes.)
의자에 앉아요. (I sit on the chair.)
가방을 들어요. (I carry a bag.)
음악을 들어요. (I listen to music.)
춤을 춰요. (I dance.)
자전거를 타요. (I ride a bicycle.)
기차를 타요. (I take the train.)
비행기를 타요. (I take the airplane.)
배를 타요. (I ride a boat.)
산을 올라요. (I climb the mountain.)
강에서 수영해요. (I swim in the river.)
길을 걸어요. (I walk on the road.)
대학에 다녀요. (I go to the university.)
학교에 가요. (I go to school.)
교실에 있어요. (I am in the classroom.)
책을 읽어요. (I read a book.)
펜으로 써요. (I write with a pen.)
연필로 써요. (I write with a pencil.)
지우개로 지워요. (I erase with an eraser.)
가위로 잘라요. (I cut with scissors.)
Sono a casa. (I am at home.)
Ho un amico. (I have a friend.)
Vado a scuola. (I go to school.)
Mi piace il cibo. (I like food.)
Leggo un libro. (I read a book.)
Ho una macchina. (I have a car.)
L'amore è bello. (Love is beautiful.)
Apri la finestra. (Open the window.)
Chiudi la porta. (Close the door.)
Vado in bicicletta. (I go by bicycle.)
Prendo il telefono. (I take the phone.)
Siediti sulla sedia. (Sit on the chair.)
Il libro è sul piano. (The book is on the floor.)
Mangio una mela. (I eat an apple.)
Bevo l'acqua. (I drink water.)
Il sole è caldo. (The sun is hot.)
La luna è bella. (The moon is beautiful.)
Il cielo è azzurro. (The sky is blue.)
Nel giardino ci sono fiori. (In the garden there are flowers.)
C'è vento oggi. (There is wind today.)
Il fiume è lungo. (The river is long.)
La montagna è alta. (The mountain is tall.)

Vado in spiaggia. (I go to the beach.)
L'albero è alto. (The tree is tall.)
Il fiore è bello. (The flower is beautiful.)
Mangio frutta. (I eat fruit.)
Mangio verdura. (I eat vegetables.)
Mangio carne. (I eat meat.)
Mangio pesce. (I eat fish.)
Il colore è bello. (The color is beautiful.)
Il cielo è rosso. (The sky is red.)

Il sole è giallo. (The sun is yellow.)

Il cielo è grigio. (The sky is gray.)

Il cielo è azzurro. (The sky is blue.)
Passiamo sul ponte. (We cross the bridge.)
La strada è lunga. (The road is long.)
Vado in auto. (I go by car.)
Vado in banca. (I go to the bank.)
Vado a scuola. (I go to school.)
Vado all'università. (I go to university.)
Vivo in una casa. (I live in a house.)
La finestra è aperta. (The window is open.)
La porta è chiusa. (The door is closed.)
Il muro è alto. (The wall is high.)
Evim çok güzel. (My house is very beautiful.)
Kitap okuyorum. (I am reading a book.)
Araba kırmızı. (The car is red.)
Ben her gün çalışıyorum. (I work every day.)
Yemek çok lezzetli. (The food is very delicious.)
Bir bardak su alabilir miyim? (Can I have a glass of water?)
Ağaçlar büyüdü. (The trees have grown.)
Evcil hayvanım bir kedi. (My pet is a cat.)
Bu yol çok uzun. (This road is very long.)
Okula gidiyorum. (I am going to school.)
Deniz çok sakin. (The sea is very calm.)
Güzel bir gün. (A beautiful day.)
Araba hızlı gidiyor. (The car is going fast.)
Yavaş yürümelisin. (You should walk slowly.)
Okul çok uzak. (The school is far.)
Evimiz okulun yakınında. (Our house is near the school.)
Küçük bir köpek. (A small dog.)
Büyük bir ev. (A big house.)
İyi bir arkadaşım var. (I have a good friend.)
Kötü bir film izledim. (I watched a bad movie.)
Mutluyum. (I am happy.)
Üzgün hissediyorum. (I feel sad.)
Baba evde. (Dad is at home.)
Anne yemek yapıyor. (Mom is cooking.)
İki kardeşim var. (I have two siblings.)
O benim en iyi arkadaşım. (He is my best friend.)
İstanbul çok büyük bir şehir. (Istanbul is a very big city.)
Köyde yaşıyorum. (I live in a village.)
Türkiye benim ülkemdir. (Turkey is my country.)
Türkçe dilini öğreniyorum. (I am learning Turkish.)
Ekmek alacağım. (I will buy bread.)
Yumruğumu sıkmam lazım. (I need to clench my fist.)
Gözlük takıyorum. (I am wearing glasses.)
Telefonum çalıyor. (My phone is ringing.)
Bilgisayarımı açtım. (I turned on my computer.)
Yeni gömlek aldım. (I bought a new shirt.)
Pantolonum çok rahat. (My pants are very comfortable.)
Ayakkabılarımı giydim. (I wore my shoes.)

vocabulary.when_to_say: Referring to time or a clock
vocabulary.example: Saat kaç? (What time is it?)
Zamanı doğru kullanmalıyız. (We must use time correctly.)
Beyaz bir elbise giyiyorum. (I am wearing a white dress.)
Siyah araba var. (There is a black car.)
Mavi gökyüzünü seviyorum. (I love the blue sky.)
Yeşil bir çimen var. (There is a green grass.)
Kırmızı elma alacağım. (I will buy a red apple.)
Sarı çiçekleri seviyorum. (I love yellow flowers.)
Kahverengi bir kutu var. (There is a brown box.)
Pembe elbiseyi çok beğendim. (I really liked the pink dress.)
Turuncu meyveleri seviyorum. (I love orange fruits.)
Mor çiçekler çok güzel. (Purple flowers are very beautiful.)
